title: I dreamed that I bought an Arab

preview.html: I dreamed that I bought an Arab in a dream through the website Vision roy2a.com, and buying an Arab is one of the goals that many people pursue in reality, and this is for the convenience of moving from one place to another and to save fatigue and exhaustion. The effort expended on various means of transportation, and today through this article we will present to you I dreamed that I bought an Arab. For the great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the condition of the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I bought an Arab in a dream. Seeing the purchase of an Arab In a dream, it states that the dreamer will have a great and prestigious position among the people. Selling an Arabic in a dream indicates that the dreamer has faced many setbacks in his professional and personal life, and God knows best. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream. Seeing an Arabic in a dream. Seeing an Arab riding in a dream. It indicates many Of the changes in the dreamer’s life. An Arab skillfully drives in a dream. It indicates that the monarch is a wise person and has the ability to control well all aspects of his life. A luxurious Arab in a dream states that the dreamer is a person with a strong and dominant personality. An ancient Arab vision in a dream states that The viewer is a weak person and does not have the ability to make the right decisions in his life. The Arab machine and smoke coming out in the dream indicates that the dreamer feels confused and unstable in his emotional and professional life. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing a dream about a car trip with someone you love. Seeing the Arab in a single woman’s dream. Seeing women Single Arab women in a dream: It shows that she will get married soon, and God knows best. Riding an Arab in one dream remembers many happy events in her life in the coming period. Seeing in a dream an unmarried woman riding a green Arab indicates that she is a good girl, distinguished by good morals and a good reputation among the people. Arab in A dream for a single woman states that she will achieve great success and excel in her personal and social life. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing a car driving with a dead person in a dream. Seeing Arabic in a dream for a married woman. Seeing an Arab woman in a dream shows that her financial situation will improve for the better in the coming period. Arabic in a married woman’s dream. It also indicates that many Positive changes will occur in her life in the coming period. Riding an Arab with a man in a married woman’s dream indicates a relationship of love, understanding and interdependence between her and her husband. A new Arab in a married woman’s dream shows that her condition will change for the better in the near future. Seeing an Arab in a pregnant woman’s dreamSeeing a pregnant Arab woman in a dream The dream announces an abundance of goodness and blessings in her life. Arabic in a pregnant woman’s dream says that she will hear promising news about her life in the near future. Seeing Arabic in a pregnant woman’s dream may indicate that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Read another explanation: Interpretation of seeing car repair in a dream Seeing Arabic in a dream For a young man, seeing an Arab young man in a dream indicates that his wedding date is approaching, and God knows best. Arabs

title: Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman praying in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman praying in a dream. We will present, dear reader, the interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman praying in a dream according to what was transmitted by scholars of interpretation, not personal judgments. Interpretation of a dream of a divorced woman praying in a dream Interpretation of a dream of a divorced woman praying in a dream can be a sign of goodness and living, God willing. If the dreamer sees a divorced woman praying in a dream, this may be evidence of the fulfillment of desires, and God knows best. If a man sees his ex-wife praying in a dream, this may be a sign of kindness, and God knows best. When a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is praying, it may be a sign of satisfaction from God Almighty, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a divorced woman reading the Qur’an in a dream Interpretation of a dream of a divorced woman reading the Qur’an in a dream can be a sign of liberation from troubles, and God knows best. As seeing a divorced woman reading the Qur’an expresses the goodness of the situation, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees a divorced woman reading the Qur’an, it may express the solution of problems with her husband, and God knows best. Also, seeing a divorced woman reading the Qur’an may mean getting rid of worry and sadness, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a divorced woman calling in a dream can indicate getting rid of problems, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a divorced woman praying in a dream, this may indicate goodness, God willing When a divorced woman sees herself praying in a dream, she may This is a sign of weakness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing, while the absolute supplication may indicate that the situation has changed for the better, and God is All-Knowing. Interpretation of dreams of a divorced woman hitting her husband in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a divorced woman hitting her husband in a dream may be an indication of the benefits she gets from him, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husband hitting her in a dream, this may be evidence of the benefits she reaps from him, and God knows best. When you see the absolute blow, it can be a sign of benefits and interests, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of a divorced woman committing adultery in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman committing adultery in a dream can be a sign of a warning to the woman by an evil man, and God knows best. Also, seeing a divorced woman committing adultery may indicate the pressure she is suffering from, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees adultery, it may lead to a loss of money, and God knows best. Also, absolute adultery can warn against committing sins and disobedience, and God is Most High. Interpretation of a dream about the engagement of my divorced friend in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about the engagement of my ex-wife in a dream may indicate that she will get rid of the problems facing her friend, God willing. title: What is the interpretation of seeing a whole shrimp in a dream?

preview.html: Trend website provides you with an interpretation of seeing shrimp in your dreams. Shrimp are marine creatures that live in salt water. Shrimp is distinguished by its beautiful taste and many great benefits that God has given to man. Shrimp in a dream can be one of the visions that many people saw in a complete dream, so we have collected for you, our followers, all the evidence about the meaning of shrimp in a dream, and we also put its interpretation to see buying shrimp in a complete dream according to the books of the leading experts in dream books. Why does it dream? Shrimp Ibn Sirin? The scholar Ibn Sirin said about the complete interpretation of seeing shrimp in a dream, and it is a sign that the dreamer has achieved his goals and desires and will hear good news in the coming period of his life. The interpretation of eating shrimp in a dream is full of visions that indicate goodness, and evidence of happiness, joy, and the beginning of... A better life than the dreamer’s life. Seeing whole shrimp in a dream and eating them while they are fresh and delicious is good news for the dreamer about an upcoming marriage to a beautiful girl, and seeing them in large numbers more than once is evidence of marriage. What beautiful cooked shrimp dreams about is a sign for the dreamer that there are a lot of Goodness in trade and profits with a lot of money, and this is a sign of profit. The presence of dead shrimp in a dream reflects all of the above, because it is a sign of problems, worries and sorrows that will enter the future life of the dreamer. Also, seeing whole fried shrimp in a dream indicates the presence of many differences Between the dreamer and relatives, as well as differences between the family. See also: Why dream of eating fish in detail in a complete dream? Why dream of shrimp? The meaning of shrimp in a dream and buying it are good visions that indicate goodness, happiness, and positive changes that will come to the dreamer in his life. Seeing a dream about buying Whole shrimp is evidence of the presence of good people in the dreamer's life and a harbinger of a happy marriage. Buying shrimp in a dream suggests that the dreamer will move to a life of luxury and indicates that he heard the good news and shows kindness and support. See also: Ibn Sirin's dream book to know the full tone in the dream. Shrimp in a dream is full With general women, why do shrimp dream of a single woman, who was old and fashionable, testifying to engagement and marriage with a good and suitable man for her in her next life? Shrimp in a dream are whole and fish in general are a wave of kindness and happiness, evidence that the girl is reaping goodness and food, and shows the pleasant events inside her. Buying shrimp in a dream is considered full of good visions that indicate a successful relationship for a future girl and this is a sign of success, luck and fulfillment of desires. There are rotten and useless shrimp in a dream that is full - a sign of close problems in the girl’s life. This vision indicates that there will be disagreements that will interfere with her marriage and engagement. See also: Why dream of seeing a whole squid in a dreamShrimp in a dream is whole for a married womanWhy dream of raw shrimp in the sea, a married woman must put an end to the disputes and problems she has experienced with

title: Interpretation of seeing cooked eggplant in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Nabulsi.

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cooked eggplant in a dream According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq and Al-Nabulsi, eggplant is considered one of the most beneficial vegetables and carries many nutrients, vitamins and fibers necessary for the body. The coming period, God willing, and he must stop worrying about his livelihood and money, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing cooked eggplant in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq and. - Nabulsi.Interpretation of the dream of seeing cooked eggplant in a dream. Interpretation of Imam Al-SadiqSeeing eggplant in a dream is a sign of an abundance of goodness and an abundance of food. If the eggplant is fried, this indicates the high status and great value that the fortuneteller enjoys in his environment. Eggplant in a man’s dream is A sign of the abundance of goodness and the wide life that he is on his way to. As for seeing cooked eggplant in a woman’s dream, it indicates the emotional state she is going through, and God is Most High. Whoever sees eggplant in his dream while it is still being roasted or toasted, this indicates many problems that The dreamer will face it in his life and some quarrels that he will face. Buying eggplant means that a lot of money and an abundance of goodness will come to the dreamer in the near future, God willing. Interpretation of the dream of seeing fried eggplant in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that the dream of eggplant is evidence of many obstacles and problems that he suffers from. Among them in the dreamer’s life, especially if the eggplant was black in color, and Ibn Sirin considered it an unpleasant vision, and God Almighty and all-knowing. If the eggplant in the dream was fried, this is an indication that the dreamer carries in his heart a lot of hatred, hatred, and envy towards the people around him. Dreaming about white eggplant is a sign of happiness and joy that will come to a person in the near future by God’s command. As for the dreamer who sees in his dream that he is eating a large amount of eggplant, this means that he will achieve many achievements and ambitions that he has always desired and strived to achieve. Interpretation of a dream about seeing Cooked eggplant in a dream, interpretation of Al-Nabulsi. Imam Al-Nabulsi agrees with Imam Al-Sadiq that eggplant is one of the praiseworthy dreams that has connotations that bring a lot of goodness, even if that eggplant is black. The most important different interpretations of seeing eggplant are: Al-Nabulsi believes that when a person dreams that he is carrying eggplant in his dream, this is a sign of abundant food, abundant food, good morals, and a good reputation that distinguishes the dreamer, and God is Most High. Those who know. As for the dreamer who sees eggplant in its season, this is a sign of good news on its way to the dreamer. While seeing eggplant out of season has a different meaning, it means that some problems and obstacles will happen to him, and some worries and sorrows, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If the eggplant is boiled This indicates many sorrows, problems, and fears that are on their way to the dreamer. Whoever sees stuffed eggplant in his dream, this is a sign of good news coming on his way if he...

title: Interpretation of seeing a farm in a dream or dreams in detail

preview.html: Seeing a farm in a dream carries many interpretations and explanations, most of which are praiseworthy interpretations that portend good visions... In the following article we will provide in detail the interpretation of seeing a farm in a dream or a dream.Interpretation of seeing a farm in a dream or a dream in detailInterpretation of seeing a farm in a dream according to NabulsiImam Nabulsi said that Seeing green plants in a dream means that a person will have a year full of sustenance and abundant goodness, in addition to the coming of good news and joy for whoever has the vision. If a sick person sees a green plant in his dream, this is good news for him for a speedy recovery soon. Interpretation of seeing a farm in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said Sirin: If one sees in a dream that he is in green plants or on a farm, this indicates that a lot of money, kindness, and abundance of food will come to him in the near future. Seeing a farm in a dream often indicates that Almighty God will bless the person by seeing the newborn. Seeing the same young man. An old man in a dream while buying a green farm means that his wedding date will be soon with a woman he married before. If a married man dreams that he is selling a green farm, this indicates his separation from his wife. Ibn Sirin said in his book “Interpretation of Dreams” that walking in the middle of a green farm means Jihad in this world, and the result of that is very good, and the farm here symbolizes good deeds. If one sees himself wandering in the middle of a farm in his dream, this indicates that he will obtain a son or a source of livelihood. Seeing someone buying a farm in his dream indicates his marriage to a good wife. If A person sees in his dream that he is selling his farm for a cheap price, then this is evidence that the visionary is selling the afterlife for the sake of his desires or is divorcing his wife in the hope of another. The woman is less than his wife. In beauty and purity. Interpretation of seeing a farm in a dream or a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing a farm in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman around a farm in her dream means stability, protection, and a happy life with her husband and children. Seeing a married woman talking about green agriculture indicates that pregnancy is near. Interpretation of seeing a farm in a dream for a pregnant woman. Pregnant woman Whoever sees a farm in her dream indicates an easy birth without any disturbance, as well as achieving her goals, desires and aspirations. Interpretation of seeing a farm in a pot for a womanIf a woman sees a farm in her dream, this indicates that in reality she has a strong love relationship. A woman who sees a farm in her dream often indicates To achieve her goals, desires and aspirations in the near future. Interpretation of seeing a farm in a dream for a man: If a man sees that he is walking among plants and trees in his dream, this indicates that he has won a lot of money or that he soon has an opportunity to travel, where he will achieve what he wants. If a man sees in his dream That he is watering trees or farms, then this is a sign from God Almighty that he will give him children, sons and daughters. If an unmarried man dreams that he is watering trees, this means that he will marry a beautiful girl and soon. The symbol of the farm in a dream. The symbol of the orchard or farm indicates a year full of goodness or the opening of a source.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead dove by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a black dead dove and interpretation of a dream about a dead white dove

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of the interpretation of a dream about a dead dove. Interpretation of seeing a dead dove in a dream. There is no doubt that seeing a dove is one of the dearest visions for many of us. This vision expresses calm, peace and psychological comfort, but the vision becomes frightening if the dove dies. Then we find that the connotations have become completely different, and perhaps it carries this The vision has many meanings that vary according to estimates. Many of them are the color of dead pigeons. Is it white or black? In addition to the size of the pigeon, it can be large or small, and the vision also varies according to the difference of opinion. It can be a man, a bachelor, or a married woman. What is important to us in this article is to mention all the cases and associations of a dream about a dead pigeon. Interpretation of a dream about a dead pigeon: Seeing a dove represents honesty and perseverance. Physical safety, good health, high ambitions, and many desires. This vision also indicates important messages, happy occasions, good news, abundance of goodness, and achieving security, peace, and tranquility. If the dove dies, it symbolizes great distress and sadness and faces many difficulties and obstacles that reduce morale. It reduces the spirit and vitality and prevents progress and achieving what is desired. Seeing dead pigeons also indicates future fears, and anxiety about the failure of efforts and thus losing many expected opportunities without being able to take advantage of them or take advantage of them. Seeing the death of pigeons may be an indication of hardness of heart and frequent conflicts and wars. And getting into many skirmishes, which indicates the outbreak of disputes and disputes whose outcomes and results will not be good. On the other hand, this vision shows the effort expended in vain or the tasks that a person aspires to pursue in order to reach his goal, but in the end he is surprised by not achieving anything. And if he sees a dove A dead dove in his hand, this is a sign of lost dreams, disappointments, and a feeling of great sadness and exhaustion. In the event that the dead dove returns to life, this indicates the end of wars, the fulfillment of an absent desire or the resurrection of hope. Interpretation of a dream about a dead dove by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in his interpretation of seeing the dove in In a dream, seeing it indicates good news, urgent news, happy news, or the spread of peace and tranquility. Seeing a dove also indicates a good wife or wife, enjoying great stability and comfort. But if one sees a dead dove, it may be an indication of the approaching life of his wife, or The deterioration of his condition, or his death from a serious illness means that he loses many of the things that his heart holds dear. On the other hand, seeing dead pigeons indicates psychological and nervous pressures, an increase in household and life burdens, and exposure to unfair competitions in which one may lose one’s place or lose one’s place without anyone noticing it. Also, seeing dead pigeons represents an accumulation or small problems and issues that one sees. Easily, causing it to be neglected, and with time it begins to accumulate until it escalates and reaches its peak, pushing it to dispersion and impossibility. To plan or exit m

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Yasin in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing Surah Yasin in a dream, as Surah Yasin is one of the Qur’anic surahs that if you see in a dream is considered one of the visions worthy of praise, and it is good, it is evidence that the dreamer will present it. God Almighty for his time, it is evidence of the forgiveness of God Almighty, and brings signs of goodness and abundance to the dreamer, and it varies according to the social status of the dreamer, and during this article we will learn in detail about the interpretation of the dream of seeing Surat Yasin in a dream.Interpretation of the dream of seeing Surat Yasin in a dreamThis vision in a dream is considered one of Good and beautiful visions because they portend mercy and forgiveness of sins. The interpretation of the dream of seeing Surat Yasin in a dream is also: Whoever sees in a dream that he is reading Surat Yasin in a dream. This dream is evidence that he will obtain a blessing from the curse of the world. Also, reading Surat Yasin in a dream is for a girl who is not... Married is evidence that she will marry a good man. If the dreamer is a married woman, this indicates her husband’s love for her, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. According to what the scholar Al-Nabulsi said, seeing Surat Yasin in a dream is evidence of feeding on the love of the family of the Messenger of God, may God bless them and grant him peace. It may also be evidence of reaping reward and rewards from God Almighty in proportion to the amount of reciting from the Qur’an twelve times. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing jahamah in a dream for single, married, pregnant women and men. Interpretation of a dream of reading Surat Yasin in the Jinn. It is one of the visions that cause fear and anxiety to the same viewer. However, it is good and carries many interpretations and associations that can be positive and good for the viewer, and in this paragraph we explain to you the interpretation of the dream of reciting Surat Yasin in the Jinn, and also: Seeing the recitation of Surat Yasin in the Jinn. It is a sign of the viewer’s safety and protection from danger. Likewise, seeing the recitation of Surat Yasin in the Jinn. Surah Yasin in a dream. It is a sign that the dreamer will be liberated from temptations and heresies. But if a person sees in his dream that he is reciting Surah Yasin to expel the jinn from the house. It is a dream that indicates resolving all disputes in it and removing problems from it. Likewise, whoever sees in a dream that the jinn heals him. By reciting Surah Yasin. This dream is evidence that the dreamer will get rid of the bad and the corrupt. See also: Interpretation of a dream about henna in a dream for single and married women, according to the most famous interpretation scholars. Interpretation of hearing Surat Yasin in a dream, especially since seeing surahs of the Holy Qur’an in a dream are considered promising visions and always carry those signs and signals. Which heralds goodness, and varies according to the condition of its beholder and differs from woman to man, and in the contexts of the paragraph that we explain to the interpretation of hearing Surat Yasin in a dream, it is also: the vision of listening to Surat Yasin in a dream. It is evidence of the provision that the dreamer is blessed with from God Almighty. Also, these The vision is evidence of abandoning disobedience and sins. In addition to the vision of hearing Surat Yasin from the mosque in a dream. This dream is a sign of happiness and also shows the dreamer’s victory over his enemies. See also: Interpretation of dreams about seeing robes in a dream by Ibn Sirin for married and single women. Interpretation of seeing Surat Yasin written in a dream and this The vision

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing newspapers in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing newspapers in a dream Newspapers in a dream are relatively ambiguous dreams that are difficult for the dreamer to interpret easily, as we see them in different forms in our dreams, such as buying newspapers or reading newspapers and other matters that make a person in a state of chaos. And the emphasis is on getting an immediate translation, because newspapers are one of the most important things in our lives, as they are circulated from all international and local newspapers that contain a lot of news throughout the day. Below, we will then show you important interpretations, concepts, and meanings to see newspapers in a dream, what the famous translator explained to us. Ibn Kathir in all its forms and meanings for different people that one must know. Interpretation of the dream of seeing newspapers in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing single women as newspapers and reading their news is evidence that she has some important things happening in her life. Seeing a girl reading news about childhood and motherhood is evidence of easy things in Her life. Seeing a girl using the newspaper in a dream to clean it and do some housework is evidence that she is not interested in her life. Seeing a girl whose name appears on the operating room paper is a sign that everyone will talk about her soon. Seeing a girl because there are news about her in the newspaper, details of marriage and engagement. Seeing a strange single woman giving her papers to newspapers is evidence that she is applying for a job or work, and that she accepts it by God’s will. Seeing a married woman reading newspapers and flipping the news is evidence that she knows some important things in her life. A married woman using newspapers to clean the house is evidence that she underestimated some Important things in her life. A pregnant woman expects her husband to carry daily newspapers and be interested in reading political news, which indicates that she will get into a big fight with work. Seeing a married woman reading women’s news is a sign of good news. Marriage Reading a page of incidents in a dream is evidence On the arrival of bad news to her. Interpretation of a dream about seeing newspapers in a dream for a single woman. If I dreamed that I saw colorful newspapers in a dream and I was an unmarried girl, this indicates that the date of engagement or marriage is approaching. Also, seeing colorful newspapers about a song in a dream also indicates that Seeing a date with happy news will bring great joy to her heart only by God’s command. Interpretation of a dream about seeing newspapers in a dream for a married woman. But if a married woman sees in her dream that she is reading and browsing newspapers, this means that she is aware of some things that seem important in her life. And if she uses newspapers for cleaning This means that she has underestimated some important things in her life and does not realize their value because God knows best. If a pregnant woman sees that her husband carries her daily newspapers and is interested in reading the political news in the newspaper. This indicates that he will fight a professional battle and it will depend on whether he wins or loses, and God is Most High. But When a married woman sees that she reads women’s news and is interested in everything related to women, this indicates her interest in hearing the news of her friends and even following them, and God knows best. But if a married woman sees

title: Interpretation of sweat in a dream Sweating in a dream

preview.html: And seeing sweat and sweat coming out and pouring from the body, sweating from the forehead, and seeing someone sweating heavily and drinking the sweat of the dead for unmarried people, for married people, for pregnant women, for divorced women, and according to Ibn Sirin, and more explanation is in the appendix to the topic below. Sweat in a dream is one of the very strange dreams that we see in our dreams. But not all the time, and it afflicts the dreamer with a state of extreme anxiety and various confusion due to the vision, as sweat is one of the secretions the body secretes constantly and comes out in the form of water to purify it. The body is free of all germs and toxins, and it appears noticeably in the summer, and it is one of the important things for the body that benefits it greatly. Interpretation of sweat in a dream: Sweat is like other things that come out of the body, if it is more than what is known, such as smell, then it is not good. Vision as if your body is sweating, then the vision indicates That you need to calm yourself down. Seeing smelly sweat is relief and relief, but the opposite is distress and loss. But seeing the sweat of others touching you is a good thing that comes to you from others. Al-Kirmani said: “Whoever sees the sweat, it will be clear that he is relieved, and if he is sick, he will recover.” Imam Al-Sadiq explained to us in his interpretations. Important meanings and results for the dreamer, which appear when he sees sweat in a dream, and which appear to us in different forms, as sweat can appear on the entire body or in certain areas. And they all need interpretation. Interpretation of the tribe in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing sweat in a dream is evidence of the solution of all fears and problems in public life. Seeing odorless sweat in a dream is a sign of positive changes in the dreamer’s life. While in a dream you see foul-smelling sweat in the armpit area. This is evidence that you are doing many things that do not please God Almighty. Sweating profusely in a dream to the point of reaching the ground is evidence that you will lose a lot of money in the near future. Sweating in a dream is a sign of money in the dreamer’s life. Seeing sweat in large quantities in a dream Evidence of saving money to spend on important things in the dreamer’s life. Heavy sweat on the body without falling to the ground is evidence of success in life. Seeing someone sweating profusely with an acceptable smell in a dream is evidence that the person is making a lot of effort to earn a permissible life. Sweating Profuse sweating with an unpleasant smell in a dream is evidence that you are earning money illegally. A sick person sweating in a dream is evidence of a short recovery. Seeing someone sweating profusely is a sign of relief and will soon end in trouble. Sweating in a dream indicates that you will earn a lot of money in The near future. Seeing a traveler sweating in a dream is evidence of an imminent return home in the near future. Interpretation of sweat in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Seeing sweat in a dream is evidence of committing sins in life. The sweat of a sick person in a dream is evidence of the soonest recovery in the near future. Sweating in The armpit area in a dream is evidence of the problems that the dreamer is facing. Seeing the armpit area in a dream also indicates major disagreements in which the dreamer will fall into.

Seeing a traveler sweating in a dream is evidence of an imminent return home in the near future. Interpretation of sweat in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq Seeing sweat in a dream is evidence of committing sins in life. The sweat of a sick person in a dream is evidence of the nearest recovery in the near future. Sweating in the armpit area in a dream is evidence of the problems facing the dreamer. Seeing the armpit area in a dream also indicates the major disputes in which the dreamer falls
